bv2:41.1: Buddhotivacanaṃ → buddhoti mama (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
bv2:48.2: mānusehi ca → mānussakehi ca (bj); mānusakehi ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
bv2:67.6: upaṭṭhissatimaṃ → upaṭṭhissati taṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli2); taṃ upaṭṭhissati (pts-vp-pli1)
bv2:70.4: buddhabījaṃ kira → buddhabījaṅkuro (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); buddhavījaṅkuro (sya1ed, sya2ed)
bv2:76.2: Padakkhiṇamakaṃsu → sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṃsu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
bv2:79.4: abhiññāsu pāramiṅgato → abhiññāpāramiṃ gato (bj); abhiññāpāramiṅgato (sya1ed, sya2ed)
bv2:179.3: bhavantvantarāyā → bhavatvantarāyo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); bhavantvantarāyo (pts-vp-pli1)
bv2:0.2: Sumedhapatthanākathā → sumedhakathā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); sumedhavatthukathā (pts-vp-pli1)
